background.en:
I specialize in backend architecture and performance optimization, with expertise in API design, multi-threading, advanced database indexing, and high-concurrency cache strategies using Redis and Lua scripts. My experience includes fixing N+1 queries, managing multi-source connection pools, and implementing distributed locks to ensure data consistency under heavy load. I am also proficient in orchestrating containerized deployments using Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD pipelines. Additionally, I have experience designing and optimizing LLM pipelines (e.g., RetrievalQAChain) to achieve low-latency, high-accuracy responses.

My personal website contains a complete skill map — feel free to reach out via email, and I will respond promptly.
